English: Strict mode restricts card transformations to only those you have discovered the idea for first.#For example, if Stick does not appear under Resources in the ideas sidebar#your villagers cannot turn a wood card into a stick card.
If enabled, strict mode will be saved with the new save file.#It will ignore the current value set in the Mod's Options screen.
Strict Mode is <color=blue>[enabled]</color>, based on the value set in the Mod Options screen.
Strict Mode is <color=blue>[enabled]</color>, as found in this Save File.#<color=blue>[count]/[current]</color> ideas were known (when save created/now).
Clearing the save removes all ideas, quests, etc from the save slot.
